Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your daily life or work experience. Considering its quality and versatility, we believe it's worth more than the standard market price. For you, we're offering it at an exclusive introductory price of $95. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
